item.title: Lean Thinking: You will probably like to learn the essence of agile
item.description: Image taken from: http://www.leansoftwareinstitute.com/images/img_bigpicture.jpg If you read the Poppendieck's book called, "Lean Software Development : An Agile Toolkit", you probably liked it because it managed to get the essence out of agile practices. So, what are these core principles? Well, most of you already know the phrase, "Inspect and Adapt". Now, you also know a bunch of specifications that facilitate this, for an instance, Scrum, XP etc. Reading the book, I had a realization that, its good to talk using concrete facts as much as possible.
